overview_of_class: Major dramatists of the 17th century, including Cervantes, Lope de Vega, Tirso de Molina, and Calderón de la Barca.
name: Golden Age Drama
title: WCAS SPANISH 321-0-1 Golden Age Drama
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Pre-registration - Reserved for Spanish Studies students.

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Major dramatists of the 17th century, including Cervantes, Lope de Vega, Tirso de Molina, and Calderón de la Barca.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
